title: PIE reveals full 'Love Recipe' MV | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me PIE reveals full 'Love Recipe' MV By KpopJoA 21 minutes ago 1,042 111 0 0 Google+ PIE made their debut with "Love Recipe" featuring band Buzz member Son Sung Hee !
Just in time for Valentine's Day, "Love Recipe" illustrates the surprising moments of a girl preparing a cake for her sweetheart for the special day with the light, joyous tune. 

Check out the song and MV above! YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
